title: PM aide congratulates Arshad Nadeem on winning gold at Asian Athletics Championship
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 31 (APP):Minister of State and Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Digital Media, Fahd Haroon, on Saturday congratulated Arshad Nadeem over winning gold medal at Asian Athletics Championship at Gumi, South Korea.
In his  his heartfelt congratulatory message he said :”This is more than a medal. Arshad’s strength, resilience and quiet determination carry the hopes of a nation. His journey reflects the spirit of Pakistan – full of heart, full of fight. Today, he made 240 million people proud once again.”
Fahd Haroon further said that from Olympic glory to Asian dominance, Arshad’s rise continues to inspire generations; proving what is possible when talent meets relentless effort.
“His achievements elevate Pakistan’s presence in global athletics and remind us all of the stories that unite and uplift us. Congratulations to Arshad Nadeem on this unforgettable moment. Pakistan Zindabad.” He added.
Arshad Nadeem, with a powerful 86.40m throw,  has once again written his name in history — winning GOLD at the Asian Athletics Championships and reaffirming his place as not only Asia’s best, but truly one of the world’s greatest athletes.
